data.client_settings: Desktop canary version 0.0.38 and desktop stable version 0.0.251
data.actual_result: Discord consumes an unnaturally high amount of cpu and causes the os to become jittery and unusable
data.expected_result: Discord should consume an average amount of cpu and the operating system should be minimally affected without lag
data.short_description: Discord has abnormally high cpu usage when screen sharing on mac os which does not happen on windows
data.steps_to_repro: - Run discord on mac os - screen share at 720/1080p - open activity monitor - see that discord consumes ~200 to 300% cpu
